name: CyberStrike (itch)
description:
CyberStrike 1 vs 1 local side by side shooter game where the objective is to destroy your opponent.

This is an academic project and was developed within an curricular unit where we had to develop a 3D game using a JavaScript game framework. The game was developed with Babylon.js and programmed with JavaScript.

This game was developed in 36h.

Controls

Player 1

A  -  move  left

D  -  move right

W -  move upward

D  -  move downward

SPACE - shoot

Player 2

🡸  -  move  left

🡺  -  move right

🡹 -  move upward

🡻 -  move downward

ENTER - shoot

Developers

Renato Proença  -->  Gameplay Programming, Game Design, Level Design
